Basketball
NCAA Basketball Championships (Men)
lead_paragraph: Isaiah Briscoe of Union, N.J., will be a centerpiece next year for John Calipari’s Kentucky team, which will likely lose several players to the N.B.A. after this season.
snippet: Isaiah Briscoe of Union, N.J., will be a centerpiece next year for John Calipari’s Kentucky team, which will likely lose several players to the N.B.A. after this season.
